name: Reviving Finale
text: You must have a bardic performance in effect to cast this spell. With a flourish, you immediately end your bardic performance, and allies within the area of the spell regain 2d6 hit points. This spell has no effect on undead creatures.
area_zh: 以你为中心, 半径20尺爆发范围
savingThrow_zh: 意志, 通过则减半 (无害); 见文本
text_zh: 施放这个法术之前，你必须激活一种吟游表演。通过挥舞手臂进行谢幕，你会立即结束你的吟游表演，所有在法术影响区域内的盟友均会恢复2d6点生命。该法术对不死生物没有影响。
